content.raw:
After installing rtql8 from https://bitbucket.org/karenliu/rtql8, I get the following compilation error:

```
[ 52%] Building CXX object gazebo/transport/CMakeFiles/gazebo_transport.dir/Connection.cc.o
In file included from /home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Joint.hh:24:0,
                 from /home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8ScrewJoint.hh:22,
                 from /home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Physics.cc:31:
/home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Physics.hh:90:28: warning: unused parameter ‘_seed’ [-Wunused-parameter]
In file included from /home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Physics.cc:48:0:
/home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Link.hh:105:37: warning: unused parameter ‘_offset’ [-Wunused-parameter]
/home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Link.hh:112:37: warning: unused parameter ‘_pose’ [-Wunused-parameter]
/home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Physics.cc: In constructor ‘gazebo::physics::RTQL8Physics::RTQL8Physics(gazebo::physics::WorldPtr)’:
/home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Physics.cc:81:45: error: cannot allocate an object of abstract type ‘rtql8::simulation::World’
/usr/include/rtql8/simulation/World.h:51:15: note:   because the following virtual functions are pure within ‘rtql8::simulation::World’:
/usr/include/rtql8/integration/Integrator.h:50:26: note: 	virtual void rtql8::integration::IntegrableSystem::setState(const VectorXd&)
```

Am I doing something wrong?
content.html:
After installing rtql8 from https://bitbucket.org/karenliu/rtql8, I get the following compilation error:

[ 52%] Building CXX object gazebo/transport/CMakeFiles/gazebo_transport.dir/Connection.cc.o
In file included from /home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Joint.hh:24:0,
                 from /home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8ScrewJoint.hh:22,
                 from /home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Physics.cc:31:
/home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Physics.hh:90:28: warning: unused parameter ‘_seed’ [-Wunused-parameter]
In file included from /home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Physics.cc:48:0:
/home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Link.hh:105:37: warning: unused parameter ‘_offset’ [-Wunused-parameter]
/home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Link.hh:112:37: warning: unused parameter ‘_pose’ [-Wunused-parameter]
/home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Physics.cc: In constructor ‘gazebo::physics::RTQL8Physics::RTQL8Physics(gazebo::physics::WorldPtr)’:
/home/jrivero/code/gazebo-rtql8/gazebo/physics/rtql8/RTQL8Physics.cc:81:45: error: cannot allocate an object of abstract type ‘rtql8::simulation::World’
/usr/include/rtql8/simulation/World.h:51:15: note:   because the following virtual functions are pure within ‘rtql8::simulation::World’:
/usr/include/rtql8/integration/Integrator.h:50:26: note:    virtual void rtql8::integration::IntegrableSystem::setState(const VectorXd&)

Am I doing something wrong?
